system.description:
Switching between using your martial and magical capabilities on the fly has become second-nature for you. You gain the following benefits:

  • You can use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t3idzgaxlrxbo0o2]{Flurry of Blows} after casting a sorcerer spell with a casting time of one action.
  • Your sorcerer levels count as adept levels for the purpose of determining which @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ec1turlvb2g9ivgd]{Practiced Techniques} options you qualify for.
  • When you cast a spell of the attack, unarmed, movement, or weaponry schools, your speed increases by 5 x the spell level until the end of the turn.
